pathAssistantSteps.info:
The volunteer is ready to be contacted to book in their Volunteer Interview

ACTION: Once Volunteer Interview and time has been scheduled, change to Screening

This is a new Volunteer Application. Send an email to confirm application is recieved and outline next steps in induction process.

ACTION: Change to Contacting once email has been sent
Your Lead has now completed all induction steps required in screening. Check that the lead is Valid, then Convert Application
Your Lead is not successful, therefore will not proceed to the next steps in induction. Do not convert this Lead. Please Log a Call to make note of why this applicant is not successful
This applicant has decided to withdraw their initial application and does not wish to proceed. Please log a call with the reason of the withdrawal in case they should apply again at a later date
